name: Super Arduino Bro
body:
Super cute and awesome pixel Jump'n'Run for your Arduino with an 8x8 RGB LED matrix. Download the game, wire up three buttons (for left, right, jump) and use the [iTead Studio Colors Shield](http://iteadstudio.com/store/index.php?main_page=product_info&products_id=312) for connecting the LED matrix to your Arduino. Have fun with Super Arduino Bro!

![Super Arduino Bro](http://semu.mp/screenshots/super-arduino-bro-20120425-000528.png)
tagline: Sexy pixel Jump'n'Run for Arduino with 8x8 RGB LED Matrix
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
